description: A virtual item redemption code that can be used to redeem the Second Coming of Solaris x Jewel Boba Crossover Pack.
bgDescription:
The collaboration between Jewel Boba and the Pioneer Association's Second Coming of Solaris has begun, bringing exclusive "jewels" to the Second Coming of Solaris!
This key includes a virtual item redemption code, which can be used to claim the Jewel Boba Crossover Exclusive Pack in the Second Coming of Solaris client.
